GUESS_TODAY: Guess today's Brawler from Supercell's mobile game Brawl Stars. Changes every 24 hours.
TO_BEGIN: To begin, simply type in the name of a Brawler. Pressing enter, clicking the button on the screen, or clicking a suggestion will all submit your guess.
THE_COLOR_OF: The color of the resulting tiles indicates how close you were to the answer.
GREEN_INDICATES_THAT: üü© indicates that your guess SHARES the same category with the answer.
RED_INDICATES_THAT: üü• indicates that your guess does NOT SHARE the same category with the answer.
UP_OR_DOWN_INDICATES_THAT: ‚¨ÜÔ∏è or ‚¨áÔ∏è indicates that the category of the answer is either higher or lower than the category of your guess.
RARITY_LIST: : Rare, Super Rare, Epic, Mythic, Legendary
CLASS_LIST: : Damage Dealer, Assassin, Marksman, Artillery, Tank, Support, Controller
MOVEMENT_LIST: : Very Slow, Slow, Normal, Fast, Very Fast
RANGE_LIST: : Very Short, Normal, Long, Very Long
RELOAD_LIST: : Very Slow, Slow, Normal, Fast, Very Fast
GUESS_A_NEW: Guess a new Brawler every day! Resets at midnight.
THIS_PROJECT: This project is not endorsed or sponsored by Supercell.
INSPIRED_BY: Inspired by Wordle, Smashdle, and Ben Gong.
USING_ASSETS: Using assets from Supercell Fan Kit.
ICONS_MADE_BY: Icons made by Bamicon, Fathema Khanom, Aldo Cervantes, and Pixel perfect from Flaticon.
SELECT_THE_LANGUAGE: Select the language you wish to play in.
IF_YOU_HAVE_ANY: If you have any languages you want to request, or if you have issues/feedback, please email at: brawldle1@gmail.com
